products.title: Chromium Thermal Blackout Satin White Roller Blind

products.title: Thermal Plus White Energy Saving Roller Blind
products.description: For a stylish way of cutting your energy bills, the thermal plus white roller blind is the perfect choice. The bright white fabric keeps your home looking light and open while ensuring the room stays cosy and warm.
